definition: to test-fire/to conduct a missile test

sentences.english: On May 26, North Korea test-fired two more missiles.
This was the second day in a row that Iran tested missiles during military maneuvers.
sentences.chinese: 这是伊郎在演习中连续第二天试射导弹。

sentences.english: Pakistan and its nuclear-capable neighbor India both routinely carry out tests of various missile.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦和其核邻国印度都经常进行各种导弹试射。

sentences.english: It is the second time India has test-fired the Agni-three missile.
sentences.chinese: 这是印度第二次试射烈火三型远程导弹。

sentences.english: The Prithvi is domestically built and has been tested for several years.
sentences.chinese: “大地”导弹由印度制造，已经有过多年试射。

sentences.english: The talks were centered on North Korea's suspected preparations to test-fire a long-range missile.
sentences.chinese: 会谈集中讨论了北韩被怀疑准备试射远程导弹的问题。

sentences.english: Iran also successfully test fired new long-and medium-range missiles in the drills.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗也成功的在训练当中试射了中程和远程导弹。

sentences.english: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.english: We were both concerned about the recent North Korean test launch of a long-range missile.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国均对最近朝鲜试射远程导弹表示担心。

sentences.english: They will test-fire an anti-missile missile next week.
sentences.chinese: 他们将于下周试射反导弹导弹。

sentences.english: Well, this is exactly what they did before they tested the Taepodong a few years ago.
sentences.chinese: 几年前他们试射大浦洞导弹之前就是这么说的。

sentences.english: Israel has fired test a new long-range missile capable of carrying nuclear warheads.
sentences.chinese: 以色列之前进行了新型远程导弹的试射。

sentences.english: The north tested a long-range missile on that day in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，北韩在那一天试射了一颗长程导弹。

sentences.english: Your sight adjustment goes to 12 miles and you've actually tried it.
sentences.chinese: 你的表尺调在12哩处且你已经确实试射过了。

sentences.english: Iranian state media report the military has successfully test fired its longest-range missile.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗国家媒体报道称，军方成功试射了远程导弹。

sentences.english: But, it has never been tested," Elleman said.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种导弹从来没有经过试射。

pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)
